scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "DB,REDIS,SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgCyan.bold" "bun run db:up" "bun run redis:up" "bun run dev:server:wait" "bun run dev:client"
scripts.dev:server:wait: bun run wait:db && bun run dev:server
scripts.setup:all: bun run db:up && bun run redis:up && echo 'Services started successfully!'
scripts.clean:all: bun run db:down && echo 'Services stopped and cleaned up'
